attr.title: ITTA
attr.desc: ITTA is a bullet-hell adventure set in a world filled with monstrous bosses. When Itta wakes up and finds herself surrounded by her dead family, her only guide is a strange spirit that takes the form of the family cat who gifts her a glowing revolver for protection.
attr.desc_md:
ITTA is a bullet-hell adventure set in a world filled with monstrous bosses. When Itta wakes up and finds herself surrounded by her dead family, her only guide is a strange spirit that takes the form of the family cat who gifts her a glowing revolver for protection.

Note: Slowdowns occur during bossfights when there are many particles on the screen! Requires Twin Sticks!
attr.inst:
Download the latest version of the game from Steam OR GOG
Copy all the game files over to ports/itta/gamedata
attr.inst_md:
Download the latest version of the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/775580/ITTA/) OR [GOG](https://www.gog.com/en/game/itta)
Copy all the game files over to ports/itta/gamedata
